text: Nicola Stephenson (born 5 July 1971) is an English actress. She is best known for portraying the roles of Margaret Clemence in the Channel 4 soap opera Brookside (1990–1994), and Julie Fitzjohn in the BBC medical drama series Holby City (1999–2001). Stephenson also portrayed Sarah Williams in the BBC drama series The Chase (2006–2007), Allie Westbrook in the BBC school-based drama series Waterloo Road (2014), and Tess Harris in the ITV soap opera Emmerdale (2015–2016). ==Other websites== * Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:English child actors Category:English television actors Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:People from Oldham Category:Actors from Lancashire
title: Nicola Stephenson
